description: The butterfly bush (Buddleja weyeriana 'Honeycomb') is an amazing plant to have in your garden! With its large panicles of golden orange flowers, it will attract an abundance of butterflies and hummingbirds. Not only does it stand out in the garden with its vibrant colors, it's also a very low maintenance plant, as it requires no deadheading and can survive in both hot, dry weather and colder climates. Its branches and leaves will remain a luscious dark green year-round. Not only that, but it needs minimal pruning, and grows at a very fast rate. All in all, the butterfly bush is a great, low maintenance plant to have in your garden!
